title: PFK Sementchi
text:
Professional Football Club Sementchi Quvasay (<a href="Uzbek%20language">Uzbek</a>: ""Sementchi" Quvasoy professional futbol klubi / "Цементчи" Қувасой профессионал футбол клуби"; <a href="Russian%20language">Russian</a>: "Профессиональный футбольный клуб "Цементчи" Кувасай") – is a professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Quvasoy">Quvasay</a> (<a href="Fergana%20Region">Ferghana Region</a>), <a href="Uzbekistan">Uzbekistan</a>. Participant of the <a href="Uzbekistan%20Pro%20League">Uzbekistan Pro League</a>.
Founded in 1987. The name of the club "Sementchi" from the <a href="Uzbek%20language">Uzbek language</a> is translated as "<a href="Cement">Cement</a> manufacturers".
History.
Football club Sementchi founded in 1987. During the <a href="USSR">USSR</a> Sementchi participated in amateur Championship of <a href="Uzbekistan%20SSR">Uzbekistan SSR</a>. Since independence of <a href="Uzbekistan">Uzbekistan</a> since 1992, Sementchi began to participate in the <a href="Uzbekistan%20Second%20League">Uzbekistan Second League</a>. in 1997 he was able to win the Uzbekistan Second League and went to the <a href="Uzbekistan%20First%20League">Uzbekistan First League</a> (today called <a href="Uzbekistan%20Pro%20League">Uzbekistan Pro League</a>). In 1998-2002 Sementchi participated in the Uzbekistan First league. 
In the 2002 season, Sementchi finishing second in the Uzbekistan First League, he got an opportunity to participate in the Uzbekistan High League (today called <a href="Uzbekistan%20Super%20League">Uzbekistan Super League</a>). 2003 season Sementchi started in the Uzbekistan High League. At the end of the season, took the penultimate 15th place and flew to the Uzbekistan First League. 
Until 2007 Sementchi participated in the Uzbekistan First League. In 2008 Sementchi refused to participate in the Uzbekistan First League and the <a href="Uzbekistan%20Cup">Uzbekistan Cup</a> because of financial problems. In the same year the club was dissolved.
in 2014 Sementchi was reborn again, and began to participate in Uzbekistan Second League. In the same season, the team was able to break into Uzbekistan First League. In 2017, taking first place in the Uzbekistan First League, the club was able for the second time in its history to get a ticket to the Uzbekistan Super League. In January 2018 it was announced that the Sementchi was not allowed to participate in the Uzbekistan Super League because of a number of outstanding requirements for the Super League. Thus, the club remained in the Uzbekistan Pro League.
Home Stadium.
The Sementchi home stadium is the Stadium Sementchi in <a href="Quvasoy">Quvasay</a>, which seats 5,000 spectators.
